title: Managing Toxic Politics in Tech (Alejandra Quetzalli)

media:group.media:title: Managing Toxic Politics in Tech (Alejandra Quetzalli)
media:group.media:description: Many women, minorities and disabled people are held back in their tech careers because no one ever told them about how politics work. More specifically, no one really warns them to look out for the specific kind of politics and abuse that big tech companies and start ups can be capable of. Itâ€™s time people were armed for knowing how to confidently manage tech politics in their career and not have politics block their career growth.
